Do you service non-feline organizations?

Yes. We provide orientation packets for dog-led, human-led, and mixed-species boards, then translate findings into feline-standard humidity language.

What is the legal humidity threshold for executive suites?

Our legal desk recommends a temperament-safe band between 58% and 64%, adjusted for velvet density and corridor drama.

Can you audit existing HVAC systems?

Absolutely. We retrofit brass crowns, scent-neutral baffles, and paw-friendly vent timing without service interruption.
